item.title: Robot Learning of Assembly Tasks from Non-expert Demonstrations using Functional Object-Oriented Network
item.description: TL;DR – This was a collaboration with Clemson University’s Yunyi Jia and Yi Chen, who were interested in using FOONs for representing assembly tasks. They successfully utilized and adapted a FOON to robotic assembly execution.
